remarks: The span of a singleton covers the zero subspace, using Definition 3.2.18 of [PtakPulmannova] p. 68 for "covers".)  (Contributed by NM, 12-Aug-2014.)
statement:
lspsncv0.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lspsncv0.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lspsncv0.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lspsncv0.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lspsncv0.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lspsncv0.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lspsncv0.e $e |- ( ph -> X =/= .0. ) $.
lspsncv0 $p |- ( ph -> -. E. y e. S ( { .0. } C. y /\ y C. ( N ` { X } ) ) ) $.
$d ph y $.
